Format.ReportTitle: Women of Reproductive Age by Civil Status

SQL.SQLRaw: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') AS AGE, CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 15 AND 49 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END AS FEMALE, CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_civilstatus_id = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END AS SINGLE, CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_civilstatus_id = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END AS MARRIED, CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_civilstatus_id = '3' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END AS WIDOWED, CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_civilstatus_id = '4' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END AS DIVORCED_SEPERATED, CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_civilstatus_id = '5' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END AS COMMON_LAW_LIVE_IN, CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_civilstatus_id = '6' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END AS UNKNOWN FROM cap_citizen WHERE DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') >=15 AND 49 GROUP BY AGE UNION ALL SELECT 'TOTAL', SUM(DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 15 and 49 AND cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12'), SUM(DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 15 and 49 AND cap_citizen.cap_civilstatus_id = '1'), SUM(DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 15 and 49 AND cap_citizen.cap_civilstatus_id = '2'), SUM(DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 15 and 49 AND cap_citizen.cap_civilstatus_id = '3'), SUM(DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 15 and 49 AND cap_citizen.cap_civilstatus_id = '4'), SUM(DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 15 and 49 AND cap_citizen.cap_civilstatus_id = '5'), SUM(DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 15 and 49 AND cap_citizen.cap_civilstatus_id = '6') FROM cap_citizen

QueryColumn.Name: FEMALE
QueryColumn.ColumnName: CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') BETWEEN 15 AND 49 THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_sex_id = '12' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END AS

QueryColumn.Name: SINGLE
QueryColumn.ColumnName: CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_civilstatus_id = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END AS

QueryColumn.Name: MARRIED
QueryColumn.ColumnName: CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_civilstatus_id = '2' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END AS

QueryColumn.Name: WIDOWED
QueryColumn.ColumnName: CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_civilstatus_id = '3' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END AS

QueryColumn.Name: DIVORCED_SEPERATED
QueryColumn.ColumnName: CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_civilstatus_id = '4' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END AS

QueryColumn.Name: COMMON_LAW_LIVE_IN
QueryColumn.ColumnName: CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_civilstatus_id = '5' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END AS

QueryColumn.Name: UNKNOWN
QueryColumn.ColumnName: CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(FROM_DAYS(DATEDIFF(NOW(),bdate)), '%Y') THEN SUM(CASE WHEN cap_citizen.cap_civilstatus_id = '6' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END AS
